name: Tour Guide Agent
description: LLM-powered tour guide agent that offers tour services. Uses RemoteA2aAgent to communicate with the scheduler. Supports configurable specializations, pricing, and availability.

card_data.name: Tour Guide Agent
card_data.description: LLM-powered tour guide agent that offers tour services. Uses RemoteA2aAgent to communicate with the scheduler. Supports configurable specializations, pricing, and availability.

skills.name: Offer Tour Services
skills.description: Submits a tour offer to the scheduler with availability, hourly rate, specialization categories, and maximum group size.
examples: Offer a culture and history tour from 9am to 5pm at $50/hour
Register availability for food tours tomorrow afternoon
